name: Sawblast
description:
Sawblast is a top down shooter with a twist - You can't shoot, and instead you must pull objects towards you and fling them into enemies to defend yourself.

How To Play:

WASD to move. Left click to pull objects towards you (not including enemies) and right click to fling them in the direction of your mouse.

Story:

You are a old wizard who has never learned any magic beyond moving objects around. When an army of creatures attacks, you are the only one who shows up to defend the city.

Credits:

Art by Robert Norenberg: https://0x72.itch.io/

Music by Kirard: https://opengameart.org/users/kirard
